DOC.brief_title: Interest Myo-inositol Supplementation Women With Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Wishing pregnancy , Having PCOS define Rotterdam criterion : high antral follicle count ( AFC ) ( > 19 per ovary ) and/or disorder cycle and/or hyperandrogenism ( least two three criterion ) , Having never treat CC ( previous treatment CC interrupt > 3 month ) .
